title: Belt, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: leather, wool felt, silk(?)
Technique: applique, felt, braided
description: White leather belt, ornamented with felt cut in hearts, ovals and circles and blue, gray, yellow and black silk; bound with red silk braid and lined with red silk.

Belt, late 19th century.Medium: leather, wool felt, silk(?)
